AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/RSSParsingTask.name: init(name:feedData:inputs:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/RSSParsingTask.abstract: Initializes the RSSParsingTask with the RSS feed data.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: object(_:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Undocumented

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: array(_:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Undocumented

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: string(_:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Undocumented

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: number(_:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Undocumented

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: null
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Undocumented

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: init(from:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Initializes a new JSON element from a given JSON object.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: init(data:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Initializes a new JSON element from a given data object.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: debugDescription
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Debug description for pretty-printing the JSON element.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: isNull
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns true if the JSONElement represents a null value.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: subscript(_:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Subscript access to the JSON object by key.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: subscript(_:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Subscript access to the JSON array by index.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asObject
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a dictionary, or nil if it is not an object.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as an array, or nil if it is not an array.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asString
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a string, or nil if it is not a string.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asNumber
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a NSNumber, or nil if it is not a number.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asBool
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Bool, or nil if it is not a boolean.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asInt
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as an Int, or nil if it is not an integer.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asDouble
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Double, or nil if it is not a double.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asFloat
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Float, or nil if it is not a float.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asDecimal
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Decimal, or nil if it is not a decimal

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asStringArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a String array, or an empty array if it is not an array of String.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asNumberArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a NSNumber array, or an empty array if it is not an array of NSNumber.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asBoolArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Bool array, or an empty array if it is not an array of Bool.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asIntArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as an Int array, or an empty array if it is not an array of Int.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asDoubleArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Double array, or an empty array if it is not an array of Double.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asFloatArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Float array, or an empty array if it is not an array of Float.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: asDecimalArray
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Decimal array, or an empty array if it is not an array of Decimal.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: toJSONData()
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a Data object of the JSON representation, or nil if it cannot be converted to an Array or Dictionary.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: toJSONString(prettyPrinted:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: Returns the JSONElement as a JSON string.
Compares two JSONElements for equality.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/TrimmingTask.h.name: init(string:tokenLimit:buffer:strategy:)
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/TrimmingTask.h.abstract: Convenience initializer for creating a TrimmingTask to trim a single string.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/AnalyzeSentime.name: AnalyzeSentimentTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/AnalyzeSentime.abstract: AnalyzeSentimentTask analyzes the sentiment of a list of strings using an LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/AnalyzeTextRea.name: AnalyzeTextReadabilityTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/AnalyzeTextRea.abstract: AnalyzeTextReadabilityTask analyzes the readability of input strings using an LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/CategorizeStri.name: CategorizeStringsTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/CategorizeStri.abstract: CategorizeStringsTask is a versatile task that categorizes strings into predefined or inferred categories using a language model.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/ClusterStrings.name: ClusterStringsTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/ClusterStrings.abstract: ClusterStringsTask groups strings into clusters based on semantic similarity, without requiring predefined categories.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/DetectLanguage.name: DetectLanguagesTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/DetectLanguage.abstract: DetectLanguagesTask identifies the language(s) of the provided strings using an LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/ExtractEntitie.name: ExtractEntitiesTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/ExtractEntitie.abstract: ExtractEntitiesTask extracts named entities from a list of strings using an LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/ExtractRelatio.name: ExtractRelationsTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/ExtractRelatio.abstract: ExtractRelationsTask extracts relationships between entities mentioned in the input strings.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/GenerateKeywor.name: GenerateKeywordsTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/GenerateKeywor.abstract: GenerateKeywordsTask extracts and optionally categorizes keywords from a list of strings using an LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/GenerateTitles.name: GenerateTitlesTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/GenerateTitles.abstract: GenerateTitlesTask generates succinct and informative titles for a given list of strings using an LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/LLMTask.html.name: LLMTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/LLMTask.html.abstract: LLMTask sends a prompt to a Large Language Model (LLM) service and returns a response.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/SummarizeConte.name: SummarizeContextTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/SummarizeConte.abstract: SummarizeContextTask is responsible for summarizing context items within a ContextController using the connected LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/SummarizeStrin.name: SummarizeStringsTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/SummarizeStrin.abstract: A task that summarizes a list of strings using the LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/TranslateStrin.name: TranslateStringsTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/TranslateStrin.abstract: TranslateStringsTask translates a list of strings into a specified target language using an LLM service.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/TrimmingTask.h.name: TrimmingTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/TrimmingTask.h.abstract: TrimmingTask is responsible for trimming strings to fit within a specified token limit.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Structs/FetchURLTask.h.name: FetchURLTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Structs/FetchURLTask.h.abstract: FetchURLTask fetches the contents of a specified URL and returns the raw data.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.name: JSONElement
AuroraTaskLibrary/Enums/JSONElement.html.abstract: A representation of a JSON element for structured JSON parsing.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/JSONParsingTas.name: JSONParsingTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/JSONParsingTas.abstract: JSONParsingTask parses a JSON blob and extracts its nested structure into a JSONElement.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/RSSParsingTask.name: RSSParsingTask
AuroraTaskLibrary/Classes/RSSParsingTask.abstract: RSSParsingTask parses an RSS feed and extracts the article links.

AuroraTaskLibrary/Structs/RSSArticle.htm.name: RSSArticle
AuroraTaskLibrary/Structs/RSSArticle.htm.abstract: RSSArticle represents an article extracted from an RSS feed.

AuroraLLM/Extensions/Swift/String.html#/.name: stripMarkdownJSON()
AuroraLLM/Extensions/Swift/String.html#/.abstract: Strips Markdown code block notation from the string, if present.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.h.name: summarizeGroup(_:type:options:)
AuroraLLM/Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.h.abstract: Summarizes a group of text strings using the LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: temperature
AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: The sampling temperature to control randomness (values between 0.0 to 1.0).

AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: maxTokens
AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: The maximum number of tokens in the generated summary.

AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: model
AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: The specific LLM model to use for summarization (e.g., “gpt-3.5-turbo”).

AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: stream
AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: Whether or not to stream the response (default is false).

AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: init(temperature:maxTokens:model:stream:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: Initializes a new SummarizerOptions with default values for all fields.

AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9Au.name: init(llmService:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Initializes a new Summarizer instance with the specified LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9Au.name: summarize(_:options:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Summarizes a text using the LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9Au.name: summarizeGroup(_:type:options:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Summarizes multiple texts using the LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/.name: init(name:context:filename:inputs:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/.abstract: Initializes a SaveContextTask with the context and filename.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/.name: init(name:filename:inputs:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/.abstract: Initializes a LoadContextTask with the ability to load a context from disk.

AuroraLLM/Structs/FetchContextsTask.html.name: init(name:filenames:inputs:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/FetchContextsTask.html.abstract: Initializes a FetchContextsTask with an optional name and list of filenames.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: vendor
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: name
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: baseURL
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: The base url for the OpenAI API.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: contextWindowSize
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 128k.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: maxOutputTokens
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: inputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: outputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: systemPrompt
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: init(name:baseURL:apiKey:contextWindowSize:maxOutputTokens:inputTokenPolicy:outputTokenPolicy:systemPrompt:urlSession:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: Initializes a new OpenAIService instance with the given API key.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: sendRequest(_:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: Sends a request to the OpenAI API asynchronously without streaming.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:.abstract: Sends a request to the OpenAI API asynchronously with streaming support.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: vendor
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: name
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: baseURL
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: The base URL for the Ollama API (e.g., http://localhost:11434).

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: contextWindowSize
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 4k.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: maxOutputTokens
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: inputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: outputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: systemPrompt
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: sendRequest(_:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: Sends a non-streaming request to the Ollama API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:.abstract: Sends a streaming request to the Ollama API and retrieves partial responses asynchronously.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: vendor
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: name
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: contextWindowSize
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 200k.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: maxOutputTokens
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: inputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: outputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: systemPrompt
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: init(name:baseURL:apiKey:contextWindowSize:maxOutputTokens:inputTokenPolicy:outputTokenPolicy:systemPrompt:urlSession:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: Initializes a new AnthropicService instance with the given API key and token limit.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: sendRequest(_:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: Sends a non-streaming request to the Anthropic API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html#.abstract: Sends a request to the Anthropic API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.name: text
AuroraLLM/Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.abstract: Extracts and concatenates content from streaming or non-streaming responses.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: model
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: The model used for generating the response, made optional as per the protocol.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: created_at
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: The timestamp when the response was created.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: response
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: The generated text returned by the Ollama API.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: done
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: A boolean indicating if the model has finished generating the response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: eval_count
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: The number of tokens in the generated response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: tokenUsage
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: Token usage is not provided in the Ollama API, so it’s nil.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: text
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: Returns the generated text content from the Ollama response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.name: promptTokens
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.abstract: The number of tokens used in the prompt.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.name: completionTokens
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.abstract: The number of tokens used in the completion.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.name: totalTokens
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.abstract: The total number of tokens used in the request.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.name: init(promptTokens:completionTokens:totalTokens:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:.abstract: Initializes the LLMTokenUsage with the given token counts.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol..name: vendor
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol..abstract: The vendor of the LLM service, if available.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol..name: model
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol..abstract: The model used to generate the text, if available.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: inputTokens
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The number of input tokens processed up to this point, if available.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: outputTokens
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The number of output tokens generated up to this point, if available.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: text
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The text content, if the content block represents a text response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: id
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The unique identifier of the content block, if applicable.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: name
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The name of the tool, if the content block represents a tool invocation.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: input
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The input parameters for the tool, if applicable.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: text
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The updated text from the model, if the delta is of type text_delta.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: partialJSON
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: The updated JSON fragment, if the delta is of type input_json_delta.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: delta
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: Represents a delta (change) in the response content, such as text updates.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: contentBlock
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: Represents a complete content block in the response, such as text or tool use.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: usage
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: Represents the usage statistics (e.g., input and output tokens) associated with this event, if available.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: Delta
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: Represents a change (delta) in the response content, such as an update to a partial text.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: ContentBlock
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: Represents a complete content block in the response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: Usage
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: Represents the usage statistics associated with the response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: id
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: The ID of the message returned by the Anthropic API.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: role
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: The role of the response, usually indicating it’s from the assistant.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: model
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: The model used for generating the response, made optional as per the protocol.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: content
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: The content returned by the Anthropic API.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: stopReason
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: The reason why the response was stopped (optional).

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: Content
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: Nested structure to represent the content data.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: Usage
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: Nested structure to represent token usage data (if available).

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: text
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: Returns the concatenated text content from the Anthropic content field.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: tokenUsage
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: Returns token usage statistics as an LLMTokenUsage object.

AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.name: isSummarized
AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.abstract: A flag indicating whether the ContextItem is a summary.

AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.name: tokenCount
AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.abstract: The estimated token count for the text content of the ContextItem.

AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.name: init(text:creationDate:isSummary:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.abstract: Initializes a new ContextItem with the specified text content and optional parameters for creation date and summary status.

AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.name: estimateTokenCount(for:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.abstract: Helper method to estimate the token count for a given text.

AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.name: isOlderThan(days:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9A.abstract: Checks if the ContextItem is older than a specified number of days.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: items
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: A collection of ContextItem instances that make up the content of the context.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: bookmarks
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: A collection of Bookmark instances within the context.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: llmServiceVendor
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The name of the LLM service vendor associated with this context.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: init(llmServiceVendor:creationDate:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Initializes a new Context with a unique identifier and associated LLM service information.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: addItem(content:creationDate:isSummary:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Adds a new item to the context.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: addBookmark(for:label:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Adds a new bookmark to the context for a specific item.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: removeItems(atOffsets:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Removes items from the context by their index set.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: getRecentItems(limit:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Retrieves the most recent N items from the context.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.name: summarizeItemsInRange(range:summarizer:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Summarizes a range of items within the context and replaces them with a summary item.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.name: contextItemID
AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.abstract: The ID of the associated context item.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.name: label
AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.abstract: A label describing the bookmark’s purpose or content.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.name: timestamp
AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.abstract: The timestamp when the bookmark was created.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.name: init(contextItemID:label:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9Auro.abstract: Initializes a new bookmark for a given context item with a specified label.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager/Routing.htm.name: description
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager/Routing.htm.abstract: A human-readable description of each routing strategy.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager/Routing.htm.name: Routing
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager/Routing.htm.abstract: Routing options for selecting an appropriate LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: registerDomainRouter(_:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Registers a new domain routing service or replaces an existing one.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: registerFallbackService(_:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Registers a new fallback LLM service or replaces an existing one.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: registerService(_:withRoutings:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Registers a new LLM service or replaces an existing one with the same name.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: unregisterService(withName:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Unregisters an LLM service with a specified name.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: setActiveService(byName:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Sets the active LLM service by its registered name.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: routeRequest(_:buffer:trimming:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Routes a request to an appropriate LLM service based on the presence of a domain routing service and registered routings.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: sendRequest(_:routings:buffer:trimming:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Sends a request to an LLM service, applying the specified routing and token trimming strategies if necessary.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:routings:buffer:trimming:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Sends a streaming request to an LLM service, applying the specified routing and token trimming strategies if necessary.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.name: addNewContext(_:llmService:summarizer:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.abstract: Adds a new context to the manager and returns the unique identifier of the new context.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.name: setActiveContext(withID:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.abstract: Sets the active context by its ID.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.name: getContextController(for:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.abstract: Retrieves a ContextController for a given context ID.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.name: summarizeOlderContexts()
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.abstract: Summarizes older context items across all managed ContextController instances.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.name: loadAllContexts()
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html#/s.abstract: Loads all contexts from disk and restores them as ContextController instances.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: updateLLMService(_:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Updates the LLM service used by the ContextController.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: addItem(content:creationDate:isSummary:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Adds a new item to the context.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: addBookmark(for:label:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Adds a bookmark to the context for a specific item.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: removeItems(atOffsets:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Removes items from the context based on their offsets.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: updateItem(_:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Updates an existing item in the context.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: summarizeOlderContext(daysThreshold:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Summarizes older context items based on a given age threshold.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: fullHistory()
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Retrieves the full history of context items.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: getItems()
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Exposes the context items for testing purposes.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: getContext()
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: Exposes the underlying context for testing or external use.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: vendor
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: The name of the LLM service vendor (e.g., “OpenAI”, “Anthropic”, “Ollama”).

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: name
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: contextWindowSize
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: maxOutputTokens
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: inputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: outputTokenPolicy
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: systemPrompt
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: sendRequest(_:)
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: Sends a request to the LLM service asynchronously and returns the response.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: Sends a request to the LLM service asynchronously with support for streaming.

AuroraLLM/Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.ht.name: adjustToServiceLimits
AuroraLLM/Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.ht.abstract: Automatically adjusts the token limits to match the service’s constraints.

AuroraLLM/Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.ht.name: strictRequestLimits
AuroraLLM/Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.ht.abstract: Strictly enforces the token limits defined in the request.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.name: createService(for:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.abstract: Creates and returns an LLM service for the given context based on the service name.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.name: missingAPIKey
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.abstract: Error thrown when the API key is missing for a service that requires authentication.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.name: invalidResponse(statusCode:)
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.abstract: Error thrown when the response from the API is invalid, typically due to an unexpected status code.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.name: decodingError
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.abstract: Error thrown when the service encounters an issue decoding the response data.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.name: invalidURL
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.abstract: Error thrown when the constructed or provided URL is invalid.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.name: custom(message:)
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:.abstract: Custom error type for providing more descriptive error messages.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: topP
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: Nucleus sampling parameter that limits sampling to the top percentile of tokens. Lower values narrow the scope of the sampling to the most likely tokens.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: frequencyPenalty
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: A penalty applied to reduce the repetition of the same tokens in the response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: presencePenalty
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: A penalty applied to encourage the introduction of new tokens into the response, promoting variety.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: stopSequences
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: Sequences of tokens that signal the LLM to stop generating further tokens when encountered in the response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: logitBias
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: A map of token biases, allowing customization of the likelihood of specific tokens appearing in the response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: user
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: An optional user identifier, which can be used for tracking, moderation, or specific user-based adjustments.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: suffix
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: The suffix to add to the generated text (if applicable).

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: preferredDomains
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: Preferred domains for the request, used for selecting the most suitable service during routing.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: init(topP:frequencyPenalty:presencePenalty:stopSequences:logitBias:user:suffix:preferredDomains:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: Initializes a new LLMRequestOptions with default values for all fields.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.name: messages
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.abstract: An array of LLMMessage instances representing either a single prompt or a conversation history.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.name: temperature
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The sampling temperature to control randomness (values between 0.0 to 1.0). Higher values (e.g., 1.0) make the output more random, while lower values (e.g., 0.0) make it more deterministic.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.name: maxTokens
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The maximum number of tokens in the generated response.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.name: model
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The specific LLM model to use for processing (e.g., “gpt-3.5-turbo”, “davinci”). If not specified, the default model for the service will be used.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.name: stream
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Whether or not to stream the response (default is false).

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.name: options
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Additional less commonly used configuration options to influence the behavior of the LLM.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.name: init(messages:temperature:maxTokens:model:stream:options:)
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Initializes a new LLMRequest with customizable parameters and reasonable defaults for most fields.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9Au.name: role
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The role of the message sender, such as “user”, “assistant”, or “system”.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9Au.name: content
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The content of the message, containing the actual text or instructions.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMRole.html#/s:9AuroraL.name: rawValue
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMRole.html#/s:9AuroraL.abstract: Returns the string value of the role, either predefined or custom.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/.name: init(name:service:supportedDomains:instructions:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/.abstract: Initializes the domain router with an LLM service and a list of supported domains.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/.name: determineDomain(for:)
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/.abstract: Determines the domain for a given request using the associated LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.name: name
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.abstract: The name of the domain router, used for logging and identification purposes.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.name: service
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.abstract: The associated LLM service used to determine the domain.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.name: supportedDomains
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.abstract: A list of domains that the router supports.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.name: determineDomain(for:)
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.abstract: Determines the domain for a given request using the associated LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.name: LLMDomainRouterProtocol
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProto.abstract: Protocol defining the behavior of a domain router in the LLMManager system.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html.name: LLMDomainRouter
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html.abstract: The LLMDomainRouter class is responsible for determining the domain of a request using an LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMRole.html.name: LLMRole
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMRole.html.abstract: Represents the role of a message sender within a conversation.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMMessage.html.name: LLMMessage
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMMessage.html.abstract: Represents a single message within a conversation for LLM interactions.

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html.name: LLMRequest
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequest.html.abstract: A struct representing the input to be sent to the Language Learning Model (LLM).

AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: LLMRequestOptions
AuroraLLM/Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: LLMRequestOptions provides a way to configure additional options for LLM requests in a structured manner.

AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html.name: LLMServiceError
AuroraLLM/Enums/LLMServiceError.html.abstract: LLMServiceError defines a set of error types that can occur while interacting with LLM services.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.name: LLMServiceFactory
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.abstract: LLMServiceFactory is responsible for creating instances of LLM services like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama.

AuroraLLM/Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.ht.name: TokenAdjustmentPolicy
AuroraLLM/Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.ht.abstract: The TokenAdjustmentPolicy enum specifies how input and output token limits are handled for an LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.name: LLMServiceProtocol
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.h.abstract: The LLMServiceProtocol defines the interface for interacting with different LLM (Language Learning Model) services.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.name: ContextController
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: ContextController manages the state and operations related to a specific Context, including adding, removing, and updating items, as well as summarizing older items. The controller handles context-specific summarization using a connected LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html.name: ContextManager
AuroraLLM/Classes/ContextManager.html.abstract: ContextManager is responsible for managing multiple ContextController instances.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html.name: LLMManager
AuroraLLM/Classes/LLMManager.html.abstract: LLMManager is responsible for managing multiple LLM services and routing requests to the appropriate service based on the specified criteria.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html.name: Bookmark
AuroraLLM/Structs/Bookmark.html.abstract: Represents a bookmark within the context, linking to a specific ContextItem by its ID.

AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html.name: Context
AuroraLLM/Structs/Context.html.abstract: Represents the entire context for a conversation or task.

AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html.name: ContextItem
AuroraLLM/Structs/ContextItem.html.abstract: A representation of an individual item within a context. Each ContextItem has text content,

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.name: AnthropicLLMResponse
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.h.abstract: Represents the response from Anthropic’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.name: AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse
AuroraLLM/Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingR.abstract: Represents a streaming response from Anthropic’s LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol..name: LLMResponseProtocol
AuroraLLM/Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol..abstract: A protocol that defines a common interface for the response of different LLM services.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: OllamaLLMResponse
AuroraLLM/Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from Ollama’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

AuroraLLM/Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.name: OpenAILLMResponse
AuroraLLM/Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from OpenAI’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html.name: AnthropicService
AuroraLLM/Classes/AnthropicService.html.abstract: AnthropicService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the Anthropic API.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html.name: OllamaService
AuroraLLM/Classes/OllamaService.html.abstract: OllamaService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the Ollama models via its API.

AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html.name: OpenAIService
AuroraLLM/Classes/OpenAIService.html.abstract: OpenAIService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the OpenAI API.

AuroraLLM/Structs/FetchContextsTask.html.name: FetchContextsTask
AuroraLLM/Structs/FetchContextsTask.html.abstract: FetchContextsTask is responsible for retrieving a list of stored contexts from the disk.

AuroraLLM/Classes/LoadContextTask.html.name: LoadContextTask
AuroraLLM/Classes/LoadContextTask.html.abstract: LoadContextTask is responsible for loading a Context object from disk.

AuroraLLM/Classes/SaveContextTask.html.name: SaveContextTask
AuroraLLM/Classes/SaveContextTask.html.abstract: SaveContextTask is responsible for saving a Context object to disk.

AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html.name: Summarizer
AuroraLLM/Classes/Summarizer.html.abstract: The Summarizer class provides an implementation of the SummarizerProtocol, delegating all summarization tasks to an LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: SummarizerOptions
AuroraLLM/Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: SummarizerOptions provides a way to configure options specifically for summarization tasks.

AuroraLLM/Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.h.name: SummarizerProtocol
AuroraLLM/Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.h.abstract: The SummarizerProtocol defines methods for summarizing content via an LLM service.

AuroraLLM/Enums/SummaryType.html.name: SummaryType
AuroraLLM/Enums/SummaryType.html.abstract: Enum representing different types of summaries that can be requested.

AuroraCore/Structs/AnyWorkflowComponent..name: init(_:)
AuroraCore/Structs/AnyWorkflowComponent..abstract: Initializes the type-erased wrapper with a concrete WorkflowComponent.

AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.name: buildBlock(_:)
AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.abstract: Builds a block of tasks or task groups into a single array of Workflow.Component objects.

AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.name: buildIf(_:)
AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.abstract: Conditionally includes a component in the workflow if it is non-nil.

AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.name: buildEither(first:)
AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.abstract: Conditionally includes one of two blocks of components based on the result of a condition.

AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.name: buildEither(second:)
AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.abstract: Conditionally includes one of two blocks of components based on the result of a condition.

AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.name: buildArray(_:)
AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html#.abstract: Flattens a nested array of components into a single array.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.name: id
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.abstract: A unique identifier for the task group.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.name: description
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.abstract: A brief description of the task group.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.name: mode
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.abstract: How tasks are executed, sequentially, or in parallel

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup/Ex.name: ExecutionMode
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup/Ex.abstract: Execute tasks sequentially in the order they were added, or simultaneously in parallel.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Task.html#/s.name: executeBlock
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Task.html#/s.abstract: A closure representing the work to be performed by the task.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Task.html#/s.name: execute(inputs:)
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Task.html#/s.abstract: Executes the task using the provided inputs.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Component.ht.name: taskGroup(_:)
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Component.ht.abstract: A group of tasks that may execute in parallel or sequentially.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow.html#/s:10Au.name: components
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow.html#/s:10Au.abstract: The components of the workflow, which can be individual tasks or task groups.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow.html#/s:10Au.name: outputs
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow.html#/s:10Au.abstract: A collection of outputs resulting from executing one or more tasks.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Component.ht.name: Component
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Component.ht.abstract: Represents a building block of a workflow, which can be either a task or a task group.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Task.html.name: Task
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/Task.html.abstract: Represents an individual unit of work in the workflow.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.name: TaskGroup
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow/TaskGroup.ht.abstract: Represents a collection of related tasks within the workflow.

AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/String.html#.name: estimatedTokenCount()
AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/String.html#.abstract: Estimates the token count for a given string.

AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/String.html#.name: isWithinTokenLimit(context:tokenLimit:buffer:)
AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/String.html#.abstract: Checks if the combined token count of the string and an optional context is within the allowed token limit, considering the buffer.

AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/String.html#.name: trimmedToFit(tokenLimit:buffer:strategy:)
AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/String.html#.abstract: Trims the string according to the specified trimming strategy.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.name: saveAPIKey(_:for:)
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.abstract: Saves an API key to the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.name: getAPIKey(for:)
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.abstract: Retrieves an API key from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.name: deleteAPIKey(for:)
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.abstract: Deletes an API key from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.name: saveBaseURL(_:for:)
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.abstract: Saves the base URL to the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.name: getBaseURL(for:)
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.abstract: Retrieves the base URL from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.name: deleteBaseURL(for:)
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.abstract: Deletes the base URL from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.name: clearAll(for:)
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s.abstract: Clears all API keys and base URLs from the secure storage (Keychain).

AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html#/.name: start()
AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html#/.abstract: Starts the timer and returns self for chaining.

AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html#/.name: duration
AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html#/.abstract: The duration as calculated as the difference between the start and end times.

AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html#/.name: reset()
AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html#/.abstract: Resets the timer by setting the start and end times to nil.

AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/Dictionary.h.abstract: Returns a new dictionary with transformed keys while keeping the same values.

AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/Dictionary.h.abstract: Resolves a value from the dictionary by its key.

AuroraCore/Extensions/Swift/Dictionary.h.abstract: Resolves a value from the dictionary by its key.

AuroraCore/Classes/CustomLogger.html#/s:.name: toggleDebugLogs(_:)
AuroraCore/Classes/CustomLogger.html#/s:.abstract: Toggles the global debug logs on or off.

AuroraCore/Classes/CustomLogger.html#/s:.name: log(level:_:category:metadata:)
AuroraCore/Classes/CustomLogger.html#/s:.abstract: Logs a message to the console with optional metadata.

AuroraCore/Extensions/Foundation/FileMan.name: createContextsDirectory()
AuroraCore/Extensions/Foundation/FileMan.abstract: Helper function to create the contexts directory in the documents folder if it doesn’t exist.

AuroraCore/Classes/CustomLogger.html.name: CustomLogger
AuroraCore/Classes/CustomLogger.html.abstract: The CustomLogger class provides a centralized logging system for the app. It allows for logging messages at different severity levels and categories, as well as enabling or disabling debug logs.

AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html.name: ExecutionTimer
AuroraCore/Classes/ExecutionTimer.html.abstract: A simple timer for measuring the execution time of code blocks.

AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html.name: SecureStorage
AuroraCore/Classes/SecureStorage.html.abstract: SecureStorage is responsible for securely saving, retrieving, and deleting API keys and base URLs using the Keychain on Apple devices.

AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow.html.name: Workflow
AuroraCore/Structs/Workflow.html.abstract: A declarative representation of a workflow, consisting of tasks and task groups.

AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html.name: WorkflowBuilder
AuroraCore/Structs/WorkflowBuilder.html.abstract: A result builder designed to construct workflows using a declarative syntax.

AuroraCore/Protocols/WorkflowComponent.h.name: WorkflowComponent
AuroraCore/Protocols/WorkflowComponent.h.abstract: A protocol representing any component of a workflow.
